citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:55 am on
12-FEB-20.
Inspector made contact with licensee. Licensee had scheduled appointments for the day and would not be able to
accompany on an inspection.
